metadata.title: Mason Cash Forest Oval Pie 18cm, Ceramic, Cream
features: The Mason Cash In the Forest range is intricately embossed with forest scenes inspired by folk tales of the mid-19th Century
Perfect for individual pies, lasagne and hot pots
description: The Mason Cash In the Forest range is intricately embossed with forest scenes inspired by folk tales of the mid-19th Century. The 18cm Oval Pie Dish is perfect for individual pies, lasagne and hot pots.
